mapper.sql: WORK_ID, WORK_TYPE, WORK_STATUS, APP_DEPT, APL_USER, APL_TIME, END_TIME, PRIORITY, WORK_DESC, SR_ID, SR_LON, SR_LAT, SR_COVER_RANG, LOCATION_ID, SITE_ID, BTS_SITE_ID, FEQ_ID, PURPOSE, SITE_NAME, EQP_TYPE_ID, EQP_MODEL_ID, COVERAGE_TYPE, BTS_CONFIG, DONOR_SITE, FEEDERLESS, MASTER_SITE, OS_VEN, OS_TYPE, PREDICE_END_DATE, END_DATE, ADDR, ZIP, CITY, AREA, VILLAGE, ADJACENT, ROAD, LANE, ALLEY, SUB_ALLEY, DOOR_NO, DOOR_NO_EX, FLOOR, FLOOR_EX, ROOM, ADD_OTHER, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME
mapper.select: select work.WORK_ID ,work.WORK_TYPE,work.WORK_STATUS, work.PRIORITY,work.SR_ID,work.PURPOSE,work.CITY,work.AREA, work.SR_LON,work.SR_LAT,work.SR_COVER_RANG,work.SITE_ID, work.BTS_SITE_ID,work.SITE_NAME,work.BTS_CONFIG,work.DONOR_SITE, work.FEEDERLESS,work.MASTER_SITE,work.PREDICE_END_DATE,work.WORK_DESC, work.FEQ_ID,work.EQP_TYPE_ID,work.EQP_MODEL_ID, feq.FEQ_TYPE FEQ_TYPE,work.LOCATION_ID,work.SR_LON,work.SR_LAT,work.COVERAGE_TYPE, work.APL_TIME,work.END_TIME,work.APL_USER,sr.FEQ_ID SR_FEQ_ID from TB_SITE_WORK work left outer join TB_COM_SITE_FEQ feq on work.FEQ_ID = feq.FEQ_ID left outer join TB_SITE_SEARCH_RING sr on work.SR_ID = sr.SR_ID where work.WORK_ID = #{workId}

select work.WORK_ID, work.WORK_TYPE, work.WORK_STATUS, work.APP_DEPT, work.APL_USER, work.APL_TIME, work.END_TIME, work.PRIORITY, work.WORK_DESC, work.SR_ID, work.SR_LON, work.SR_LAT, work.SR_COVER_RANG, work.LOCATION_ID, work.SITE_ID, work.BTS_SITE_ID, work.FEQ_ID, work.PURPOSE, work.SITE_NAME, work.EQP_TYPE_ID, work.EQP_MODEL_ID, work.COVERAGE_TYPE, work.BTS_CONFIG, work.DONOR_SITE, work.FEEDERLESS, work.MASTER_SITE, work.OS_VEN, work.OS_TYPE, work.PREDICE_END_DATE, work.END_DATE, work.ADDR, work.ZIP, work.CITY, work.AREA, work.VILLAGE, work.ADJACENT, work.ROAD, work.LANE, work.ALLEY, work.SUB_ALLEY, work.DOOR_NO, work.DOOR_NO_EX, work.FLOOR, work.FLOOR_EX, work.ROOM, work.ADD_OTHER, work.CR_USER, work.CR_TIME, work.MD_USER, work.MD_TIME from TB_SITE_WORK work left join TB_SITE_WORK_ORDER workOrder on work.WORK_ID= workOrder.WORK_ID where workOrder.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

select work.WORK_ID, work.WORK_TYPE, work.WORK_STATUS, work.APP_DEPT, work.APL_USER, work.APL_TIME, work.END_TIME, work.PRIORITY, work.WORK_DESC, work.SR_ID, work.SR_LON, work.SR_LAT, work.SR_COVER_RANG, work.LOCATION_ID, work.SITE_ID, work.BTS_SITE_ID, work.FEQ_ID, work.PURPOSE, work.SITE_NAME, work.EQP_TYPE_ID, work.EQP_MODEL_ID, work.COVERAGE_TYPE, work.BTS_CONFIG, work.DONOR_SITE, work.FEEDERLESS, work.MASTER_SITE, work.OS_VEN, work.OS_TYPE, work.PREDICE_END_DATE, work.END_DATE, work.ADDR, work.ZIP, work.CITY, work.AREA, work.VILLAGE, work.ADJACENT, work.ROAD, work.LANE, work.ALLEY, work.SUB_ALLEY, work.DOOR_NO, work.DOOR_NO_EX, work.FLOOR, work.FLOOR_EX, work.ROOM, work.ADD_OTHER, work.CR_USER, work.CR_TIME, work.MD_USER, work.MD_TIME, feq.FEQ_TYPE FEQ_TYPE,sr.FEQ_ID SR_FEQ_ID, work.CPL_NO,work.PERMIT_NO,work.LICENSE_NO,work.END_SITE_STATUS,work.START_SITE_STATUS from TB_SITE_WORK work left outer join TB_COM_SITE_FEQ feq on work.FEQ_ID = feq.FEQ_ID left outer join TB_SITE_SEARCH_RING sr on work.SR_ID = sr.SR_ID where work.WORK_ID = #{workId}
SELECT DISTINCT APP_DEPT from TB_SITE_WORK WHERE APP_DEPT is not null
